name: Color Switcher (EyadTheGreat)
description:
Controls:- Movement = WASD

Welcome to color switcher, The game was made for the paint 2020 game jam where I had to make a game in 2 days while using paint.

The map is made of blocks with different colors, When standing on the block with the same color, your bar recharges and standing on anything else the bar depletes, and then you die.

But watch out! There are enemys that spawn at random, And they have can change your color!

Enjoy!

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
